    • Method Detail

      • getCalendarEvents

        public static java.util.List getCalendarEvents(java.lang.Long userId,
                                               java.lang.String status,
                                               javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                                               int firstResult,
                                               int maxResult,
                                               int direction)
                                        throws CalendarException

        Returns list of calendar events by user identity and status considering pagination:

        only the sublist,correspondence to the current page is retrieved
        Parameters:
        userId - user identity
        status - status of retrieved events
        request - Http Servlet Request
        firstResult - beggining index of retrieved events sublist
        maxResult - ending index of retrieved events sublist
        direction - pagination direction(i.e. forward, backward)
        Returns:
        sublist of events for selected user and status correspondence to the current page
        Throws:
        CalendarException - if db-access errror occurs

      • getCalendarEvents

        public static java.util.List getCalendarEvents(java.lang.Long userId,
                                               java.lang.String siteId,
                                               java.lang.String instanceId,
                                               java.lang.String status,
                                               int firstResult,
                                               int maxResult,
                                               int direction)
                                        throws CalendarException

        Returns ordered list of calendar events by user identity,status and selected site and instance considering pagination:

        only the sublist,correspondence to the current page is retrieved

        when pagination has direction - forward only the events with archive date after current date(including) ordered ascending by event's publication date are retrieved

        when pagination has direction - backward only the events with archive date before current date ordered descending by event's publication date are retrieved
        Parameters:
        userId - user identity
        siteId - site identity
        instanceId - instance name
        status - status of retrieved events
        firstResult - beggining index of retrieved events sublist
        maxResult - ending index of retrieved events sublist
        direction - pagination direction(i.e. forward, backward)
        Returns:
        ordered sublist of events for selected user,status,site and instance correspondence to the current page
        Throws:
        CalendarException - if db-access errror occurs

      • getCalendarEvents

        public static java.util.List getCalendarEvents(java.lang.String siteId,
                                               java.lang.String instanceId,
                                               java.lang.String status,
                                               int firstResult,
                                               int maxResult,
                                               int direction)
                                        throws CalendarException

        Returns ordered list of calendar events by status and selected site and instance considering pagination:

        only the sublist,correspondence to the current page is retrieved

        when pagination has direction - forward only the events with archive date after current date(including) ordered ascending by event's publication date are retrieved

        when pagination has direction - backward only the events with archive date before current date ordered descending by event's publication date are retrieved
        Parameters:
        siteId - site identity
        instanceId - instance name
        status - status of retrieved events
        firstResult - beggining index of retrieved events sublist
        maxResult - ending index of retrieved events sublist
        direction - pagination direction(i.e. forward, backward)
        Returns:
        ordered sublist of events for selected user,status,site and instance correspondence to the current page
        Throws:
        CalendarException - if db-access errror occurs

      • getCalendarEvents

        public static java.util.List getCalendarEvents(java.lang.String status,
                                               javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                                               int firstResult,
                                               int maxResult,
                                               boolean today)
                                        throws CalendarException

        Returns list of calendar events for selected status considering pagination:

        only the sublist,correspondence to the current page is retrieved
        Parameters:
        status - status of retrieved events
        request - Http Servlet Request
        firstResult - beggining index of retrieved events sublist
        maxResult - ending index of retrieved events sublist
        today - true if events with publication date before current date will be retrieved, if false events with publication date before or after current date will be retrieved,
        Returns:
        sublist of events for selected status correspondence to the current page
        Throws:
        CalendarException - if db-access errror occurs

        only the sublist,correspondence to the current page is retrieved

      • getCalendarEvents

        public static java.util.List getCalendarEvents(java.lang.String status,
                                               javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                                               int firstResult,
                                               int maxResult,
                                               java.util.Date fromDate,
                                               java.util.Date toDate)
                                        throws CalendarException

        Returns list of calendar events by status considering event's publication and archive dates and pagination:

        only the events having publication or archive dates between fromDate and toDate parameters are retrieved

        only the sublist of events,correspondence to the current page is retrieved
        Parameters:
        status - status of retrieved events
        request - Http Servlet Request
        firstResult - beggining index of retrieved events sublist
        maxResult - ending index of retrieved events sublist
        fromDate - date,after which the event should be published or archived
        toDate - date,by which the event should be published or archived
        Returns:
        sublist of events for selected status with publication or archive dates between fromDate and toDate, correspondence to the current page
        Throws:
        CalendarException - if db-access errror occurs

      • getCalendarEvents

        public static java.util.List getCalendarEvents(java.lang.Long userId,
                                               java.lang.String status,
                                               int firstResult,
                                               int maxResult)
                                        throws CalendarException

        Returns list of calendar events with publication date before current date(including) and archive date after current date(including) ordered descending by event's publication date by user identity and(if not null) by status considering pagination:

        only the sublist od events,correspondence to the current page is retrieved
        Parameters:
        userId - user identity
        status - status of retrieved events or null
        firstResult - beggining index of retrieved events sublist
        maxResult - ending index of retrieved events sublist
        Returns:
        ordered list of events published before current date and with archive date after current date
        Throws:
        CalendarException - if db-access errror occurs

                                           java.lang.String languageCode,

                                           java.lang.String description,
                                           javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
        Creates Calendar instance by user identity,status,language,title, description and Http Servlet Request
        Parameters:
        userId - user identity
        statusCode - status of event being created
        languageCode - language code of event being created

        description - description of event being created

        Throws:
        CalendarException - if db-access errror occurs
